website_summaries.verdict: This simple fire pit was specifically engineered to create efficiently burning, low-smoke fires.
pros: Great heat output and great fire experience
Double-wall design maximizes airflow and burning process
Bottom vent holes let oxygen feed the fire while channeling warm oxygen between the walls of the stove and back into the fire
Efficient burn means little to no smoke
cons: Prone to rust, so be sure to get a cover to keep water out
Consider drilling drainage holes in the bottom

customer_reviews.title: there's very little smoke when used correctly and it looks amazing when it's dark and you can't see how the ...
customer_reviews.text: The 'Precision Base Plate' layer that has holes in it where the firewood rests quickly deformed and appeared to deteriorate after each fire. The shiny polished finish was gone after one use. I just couldn't see this holding up after long term. I would expect maybe a year of weekly bonfires and it would need to be replaced. The ash can be difficult to remove. On the positive side, there's very little smoke when used correctly and it looks amazing when it's dark and you can't see how the finish discolored after one use. Not worth the price in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: J. Cameron

customer_reviews.title: it works! ... but it rust... :(
customer_reviews.text: used once so far, worked great, no smoke, just dumped the ashes in the morning. it is heavy (20#) 01/04/18: had to drop from 5 to 3 stars. My bonfire has begun to rust. I've kept it clean, dry, etc. the rust started just recently the morning after an evening fire. Very concerned this will degrade and destroy the fire pit...
customer_reviews.author: B. Tucker

customer_reviews.title: As advertised. Virtually NO smoke!
customer_reviews.text: I don't write a lot of reviews, but feel compelled with this purchase. I have now burned several fires in the Solo Fire pit and am very impressed. What you get is a hot virtually smokeless campfire. The first time we used it was on a cold (45°) night with high winds. Prefect scenario for smoke. Little if any smoke and after about 4 hours of burning wood, we didn't smell like the fire pit. Burnt down to total ash and clean up was a breeze! I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Slider 31

customer_reviews.title: This thing rocks!!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the coolest things I've ever seen for Burning wood in your backyard!! I've only had it on for about 15 minutes but it's already super bad ass !! I can tell that the sides are already starting to get black which is to be expected but the way that the fire burns is super cool! I do think it's important not to leave it outside overnight with the morning dew and other things making it wet... i'm going to get a couple more of these for gifts because they're just so cool! It uses barely any kindling to get a nice fire going and there's barely any smoke coming out...
customer_reviews.author: mark bernardin

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Love it Outside wall BELOW fire base (bottom fourth of the unit) stay cool to the touch - the rest is hot to the touch. Take care if young children are around. Works as described. Easy lighting. Initially it smokes like all others but eventually when it gets going whatever smoke is produced goes straight up not bothering the folks around it. Burns log all the way through Great marshmallow roasting (smores) Why 4 stars? It's not 100% made of the right truly stainless metal (meaning overtime it will discolor) and at that price it should had been. It is expensive all around.
customer_reviews.author: xaeinstein

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely hate campfires, but my husband loves them
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely hate campfires, but my husband loves them. So obviously that created quite a problem for us. Our solution, the Solo Stove! The reason I don’t like campfires is because I always smell like them afterwards, my hair, my clothes, it’s awful! However, after giving the Solo Stove a few tries, I haven’t smelled like fire once!! I call that a win-win! So if you’re like me, and can’t stand smelling like campfire, I’d highly recommend giving this a try!
customer_reviews.author: Katelynn

customer_reviews.title: Rusted after one use and I didn’t get it wet
customer_reviews.text: Over priced and rusted in one use. It does look neat when burning very little smoke. I used dry oak that I have in my wood shed was very disappointed when I came out the next morning to clean out the ash and noticed rust on the inside. My wood was dry it didn’t get wet. Save your money 😡
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dented
customer_reviews.text: Product came dented, the box was fine, unfortunately I open ended the box after 30 days. The fire pit does produce a cool flame, doesn’t throw a lot of heat. There was rust a the bottom grate after the first weekend. Overall,I don’t think I would buy another.
customer_reviews.author: steve mccusker

customer_reviews.title: More smoke than expected.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the Stove Bonfire because we wanted to have a fire in the backyard without smoking put the neighbors. After trying it out we had a black smoke coming out. It was bad enough it turned out hot dogs black and we had to throw them away. Now the whole inside of the bonfire is black. It burns the logs hot and efficiently but there is much more smoke than I expected. It works as a fire pit but wouldn’t recommend, a regular put works just as good.
customer_reviews.author: Darline DeBry

customer_reviews.title: Great idea and it works, just doesn't transmit heat well enough.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great idea, especially for sitting around a fire in the summer. Unfortunately it's pretty ineffective when the mercury drops. Due to its design it insulates the outer portion from the heat of the fire. If you're not right up against it or hovering over it you don't really get the warmth you'd expect from a typical fire pit. It does work as advertised as far as very little smoke and complete combustion goes, and it won't burn your grass if you move it the next day.
customer_reviews.author: MikeofLA

customer_reviews.title: RUST
customer_reviews.text: have not had for even a month.... i keep it outside covered and the grates on the inside are rusting to the point that it looks as if i left it out all winter..
customer_reviews.author: edgar nunez

customer_reviews.title: Solo Stove products
customer_reviews.text: I have three Solo Stoves...the oringinal, the campfire and now the bonfire. The original sold me on the design and efficiency of the burn. The Campfire, well it's bigger and more useful for trekking with more than just me. The bonfire ...it's just cool ...for evenings on the patio. Their nesting pots are rediculously well made. What's nice ...you can nest the original in it's 900 pot...and that combination in the 1800 pot. You have two different size pots to use... with the original. The Campfire Stove's two pot kit well... you're good to go...
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Jones

customer_reviews.title: Even with the Trade-offs, it’s a Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: This stove does pretty much what other buyers claims about the controlled combustion. Lite enough to move around, unlike our previous sand-filled, fire pit. We got a number of compliments on it on Halloween, when we had it burning on our driveway. The drawbacks Includes no provision to cover it when rain is expected, need to store it from the elements, and also messy and difficult in dumping the ash from it. But all in all, even with the drawbacks, I would still buy it for its looks and performance.
customer_reviews.author: Robert G.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Must have for the campfire connoisseur. The Solostove Bonfire burns very clean, never had a problem starting a fire. I have used it several times and never had to turn or flip the logs to keep the fire burning. Lots of heat. No smoke. Move the fire to different locations and never leave a mess. It's perfect! Does everything as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome fire pit!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! Crazy hot! Used a wax charcoal starter brick and it was up and running. Comes with a nice bag to put it in. Nothing but ash in the bottom. Fun watching the fire come through the top holes.
customer_reviews.author: J. Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works great. No rust so far. Does collect water in the pit if left outside. The included cover is not worth much. The manufacturer should engineer a stainless metal cover. They should also consider integrating handles on the fire pit.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: This was recommended to me by a friend who camps often
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended to me by a friend who camps often. It met and exceeded my expectations! Received it quickly, packing was sufficient, and I like that it has a storage bag with handles. It was perfect for our camping trip and hubby liked it as well. Easy to build fire in and burns down to nothing. One improvement would be actual handles to carry it with; other than that, it was awesome!
customer_reviews.author: A. Elkins

customer_reviews.title: Smoked
customer_reviews.text: Smoked like a chimney very disappointed even with 1 log it smoked
customer_reviews.author: Nzzzz

customer_reviews.title: The interior of the stove rusted after 2 years with indoor storage.
customer_reviews.text: I like the solo stove for the most part. I’ve had it for two years used it a number of times. My only complaint is that I had stored it in my garage and when taking it out to use it for the first time this year I noticed the inside was rusted. I was suprised since this is stainless steel. I contacted the company and was sent a list of ways to treat the rust. That is helpful however I was hoping this fire pit would have held up a little better.
customer_reviews.author: David K.

customer_reviews.title: It gets HOT.
customer_reviews.text: It’s cool. No smoke when it gets going. Of coarse it smokes until it starts drawing air and starts the gasification process and it makes a impressive amount of heat. My buddy put his aluminum griddle on it and it only took a few minutes to burn the anti stick coating completely off and warp the griddle. I’m not sure I would even put cast iron over it when it’s going good, warp factor 10 for cook ware.
customer_reviews.author: Magnum

customer_reviews.title: Was not what we excpected from all the reviews
customer_reviews.text: Good for very small area smokeless? hardly is kind of mesmerizing to watch how the flames come thru the holes more cool then practical. Also need to come with a water proof stainless cover for the kind on money they get for these makes a mess when it rains.
customer_reviews.author: wd lash

customer_reviews.title: Smokeless?
customer_reviews.text: This thing definitely smokes a lot. I used a nice big chunck of wedged log (whole piece from Home Depot) burns great. But boy, the hype about the smokeless stuff? You’re definitely going to smell like a campfire.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Zargaran

customer_reviews.title: The best Fire pit that money can buy!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and i was so skeptical about this product at first so we bought the small version for camping but after using it the whole summer of 2019 we were amazed and the rest of the people we camped with. So now we decided to grab a bigger one bcoz our camping group are starting to grow :) we just cant wait for the summer here in Alaska so we can enjoy once again what this fire pit can do! Buy it! You wont regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Ian P.

customer_reviews.title: Had been watching this for a while... GREAT fire pit
customer_reviews.text: Received this just before we had outdoor dinner party in early June, there was a chill in the air and i lit the fire i had pre-staged. A bit of smoke initially while it caught fully but after that, NOTHING... This thing throws awesome heat, and burns nice and clean. Only hard thing is getting the ashes out, which seem to be less due to the high heat. Highly recommend this Rick
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen B.

customer_reviews.title: Best Fire Pit I have ever seen
customer_reviews.text: This product is advertised as practically smokeless, and when you use it as recommended, it is! My wife has never been able to sit out by the fire with us when we camp because she is allergic to the smoke and as you know, smoke always follows the one that hates it the most. On our last camping trip, she was able to sit by the Solo Stove fire pit every night without the smoke. I think about all those Smores nights with our grandchild that she missed over the years. This product is fairly expensive, but well worth the cost to us.
customer_reviews.author: TigerDen

customer_reviews.title: Pretty close to spot on
customer_reviews.text: The Solo is basically why’s advertised, but with a couple of caveats: 1) It doesn’t just magically burn everything to fine ash. You really need a full chamber of wood built up slowly to make this happen. 2) The amount of smoke seems to be the same - the heat and wind tunnel effects just shoot it straight up. 3) It burns a LOT of wood. I mean, a LOT. Plan accordingly. Otherwise, we’re pretty happy. Still better than any other pit out there we’ve seen.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Weatherly

customer_reviews.title: I love backyard campfires
customer_reviews.text: I love backyard campfires, but neither my wife nor I like the smoke that often billows up if it's windy or the wood is damp. Although the Solo Stove Bonfire is not smoke free, the bottom draft and wind protection that the unit provides makes it much less smokey that my previous backyard pit. In addition, my fires light more easily because of the draft and wind protection. A very good product
customer_reviews.author: Steven W. Funderburg

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Reduces the smoke far more than we expected. Definitely everything they advertised and we're really happy with the product. We're thinking of buying another one so that we can have two going when we have larger groups of people here.
customer_reviews.author: pbh777

customer_reviews.title: An actual smokeless fire pit that works!
customer_reviews.text: An amazing fire pit with amazing looks! When they say smokeless they really mean it. My family and I have been enjoying it like crazy here in the Pacific Northwest. Great build quality, nice price point!
customer_reviews.author: Pockets

customer_reviews.title: Overall very pleased and look forward to many nights in front of it
customer_reviews.text: Just got the product in the mail. Had my first fire with it yesterday. I was impressed with how quick the fire got going. The bonfire was definitely a lot more efficient than a standard fire pit and the wood burned all the way down to dust. Very nice flames and was nice too watch the fire shoot through the top vents. Overall very pleased. My only complaint would be the maintaince since it needs to be stored inside. It’s a long process by the time the pit is cool enough to move. Additionally wasn’t the easiest thing to lug around and get in the bag with out getting a bit ashy
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: A must have for outdoor families.
customer_reviews.text: My husband was very pleased with this b/d gift. Tried it right away on our covered patio (raining outdoor) and it works great. We are RV campers and just are eager for our next trip to make use of our new bonfire pit. Husband added a small chain link and s hooks for a easier way to pick up and store in it’s carrying case, which is really nice. Highly recommend. Thinking of getting one for our son and his family...a great Christmas gift for outdoor families.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good heat and portable
customer_reviews.text: I'll keep it short. I was so impressed with the performance of this product that i bought a second as a gift for a good friend. Good heat and very minimal smoke when first lit.
customer_reviews.author: FRANK S.

customer_reviews.title: Buy this thing
customer_reviews.text: Bought the Solostove sight unseen upon the recommendation of a friend. It absolutely is as "smokeless" as any campfire you have ever built in your life for 2 reasons: the secondary burn is real and you can see jets of flame all around the upper ring burning the energy contained in smoke particulates; and because the heat is so intense within such a tight diameter, a "virtual chimney" is formed as a column of heat blasts whatever smoke is left straight up and away from your clothes, even in a breeze. In the morning, all that's left is baby-powder like ash and a shirt that you can wear again that day.
customer_reviews.author: KMAC

customer_reviews.title: We love our solo stove “fire pot”
customer_reviews.text: Love this fire pit, just wish it were a tiny bit wider to fit standard cut fire logs more easily. We lovingly call it our “fire pot”, and are amazed by the heat that is generated from this baby. We tried several covers to protect it from the elements and the 22 inch round koveroos is the best fit, though a little too big (KoverRoos III 34262 22-Inch Round...  Would definitely purchase this fire pit again.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Alessandrini

customer_reviews.title: Great fires
customer_reviews.text: This has been the best fire pit we have owned. We bought this a year ago and have had 50+ fires in it, we love how easy it is to use and the heat it puts out. The fire that comes out of the holes in the top are great to see. The only problem I have is we don't empty out the ashes as often as we should and it get a little messy dumping them out. The good thing is it burns the firewood down to nothing. We would recommend this for anyone who loves an out door fire as much as my Pyro loving wife.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Contrary to Product Description Carry Bag NOT Included.
customer_reviews.text: Solo Stove works fine, but the product description said a nylon drawstring carry bag would be included, and it was not.
customer_reviews.author: StacieM

customer_reviews.title: We love our Solo Stove Bonfire pit
customer_reviews.text: We love our Solo Stove Bonfire pit. You still get a little smokey smell on you, but I'd say it reduces the smoke by about 50% and you rarely (if ever) get those large blasts of smoke in your face. It lights easily, the fire is simple to maintain and it burns very efficiently. When I go clean the pit up the next morning after a good evening fire (3-5 hours) there is usually only around 1-2 cups of ash and no large wood chunks. I have been recommending this to all of my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Aggie Fan

customer_reviews.title: This pit is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: An amazingly efficient firepit! Low smoke and hot burn reduces wood to powdered ash. We enjoy a fire in the evening occasionally and especially when good friends come over for dinner and wine! We bought the Campfire as well for a smaller and more intimate experience; moreover, it was very handy recently when the power was out to prepare breakfast!
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Engineered well, works great and looks really cool.
customer_reviews.text: Love my new Solo Bonfire Stove. Tried it out camping this past weekend and it was great! Easy to set up and clean up was even easier. My wife did not understand why I did not purchase a less expensive fire pit. After we use it and she saw how little it smoked and how easy it was to clean she said it was a good investment. It looks really sharp as well. We received some nice compliments on how nice our fire pit was from other campers. Glad I made the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mark E. Nussbaumer

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: very little smoke, also very little radiated heat. The design works properly, just don't expect to sit around a toasty fire for warmth...unless you get it rip roaring above the rim, then expect more smoke to escape as well. Mine came with the bottom ring/stand which I wasn't expecting. Well made, minor discoloring from the rain
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: My friends and I had a great experience with the Solo Fire Pit
customer_reviews.text: My friends and I had a great experience with the Solo Fire Pit. The item is extemely easy to use ,burns very efficiently and makes a really cool item for friends and family to gather around on a chilly night. A little on pricey side; but cost is justified since the fire pit is very well made. Very good investment!
customer_reviews.author: jack j. seng

customer_reviews.title: Worth it. You wont regret buying one.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. It's a little pricey, but worth every penny. Very high quality construction. No smoke after it gets going, no smoky smell on my clothes. Extremely warm, but the heat radiates at you from the walls and the fire is barely affected by wind direction, so I end up being warm regardless of wind. Wood burns down to a very fine ash. Only downside is not being able to put out the fire. However, once the fire is low enough, I can put a screen over the top to catch sparks. Bottom remains cool to the touch (won't scorch grass), so it's pretty safe to walk away from.
customer_reviews.author: Ja16351

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use with no fuss
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised and I am very please. Thought about the bigger one but this size is just right for my patio at our farm. I have lots of dry pecan wood that burns really well
customer_reviews.author: W. Mills

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited about this fire pit but after receiving and using it for the first time what a let down. The fire looked very impressive with the stainless steel but that was about it. There was still a lot of smoke and the fire didn’t burn any different than any other fire pit I have used. It is also high maintenance with having to clean out and cover after every use. Not worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Built with quality and burns efficiently.
customer_reviews.text: It’s an expensive purchase. It seems as if it will last, because it’s built rock solid. It works great for making a clean fire with minimal smoke. I’ve posted a picture for anyone wondering how hot the outside gets. That is the temp after 6 hours of burning. Cleanup was easy after burning three stacks of wood. Ash was so fine that it all poured out with one tip and a couple shakes. I am very impressed with the solo stove. My thoughts, if you’re on the fence about getting one... do it.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Definitely get what you pay for, plus it has a lifetime warranty. It does what it says with no smoke smell on your clothes. Only smoke is on startup, but as soon as fire starts it’s all flam. It also consumes all the wood, only ash is left to be discarded afer it cools down.
customer_reviews.author: Molokaipake

customer_reviews.title: awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This thing really works. Smoke goes straight up no matter the wind. Burns down to virtually nothing. Thought it was pretty expensive until we used. Put in front of the wives swing... she loves it. Happy wife Happy life! Buy it! Uses hardly any wood. 5 pcs from a Pallet 16" burned 1.25 hours.
customer_reviews.author: KMP

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful bonfire for your deck
customer_reviews.text: I didn't know what to expect but the reviews were fantastic. We have a deck where we needed a nice looking bonfire but could not run gas or build heavy rocks. This stove exceeded all of my expectations. It is beautiful, works great, and it is easy to maintain. Setup was just putting it where you want and I have it directly on my deck with no issues with burning or heat under the stove. Our family has used this every day since we bought it.
customer_reviews.author: David Y. Chen

customer_reviews.title: Glad I purchased it.
customer_reviews.text: It burns with less smoke, but you'll still get some smoke. I actually had a good sized fire and didn't need to close the patio door, which I could never do with my standard fire pit. You needn't use as much wood to get a good hot fire, and I was able to place my bbq grill over the top of it nicely. Once the fire was done, I was pretty impressed by how little ash remained. It is cool when the fire is at its peak and comes up through the small holes near the rim.
customer_reviews.author: Jo E. Meyertons

customer_reviews.title: Solo stove fireplace insert + outdoor firepit!
customer_reviews.text: For anyone asking about using it inside a masonry fireplace, I can confirm that it does work and keeps the smell out of the house versus using the fireplace with the standard wood grate. One downside is that it is fairly tall and puts the flame pretty height up inside the box. I'll keep an eye on it and update if i see any other major issues or drawbacks. On another note, I haven't gotten it wet but can confirm like others that it starts to rust right away. Well see how long it lasts. I also purchased the stand from solo stove directly and it is awesome; you can place the pit just about anywhere on the stand.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: This thing is GREAT!!
customer_reviews.text: As advertised!! Quick to start, absolutely minimal amount of smoke, and cleans up easily. Because air flows from above and below the wood, it burns hot and everything burns down to a handful of ashes. The storage / carrying bag is well made and makes it so convenient to move and store. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: wiseguy6768

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great looking fire
customer_reviews.text: I’ve only had two fires, but I’m impressed so far. I put it on my deck on top of a 24” paver and had not had any problems with heat on my wood deck. The flame looks great and doesn’t take that long before everything is up to temperature and is near smokeless. I don’t have too many insights on durability yet because I haven’t had it that long. The only thing is wish was different was that it came a little bigger than 19.5”, but it’s not a deal breaker for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Still allows some smoke to bellow but it’s worth the money. As long as you keep the wood short enough to remain inside it will have a reduction in smoke. Burns everything down to minimal ashes which allows for easy cleanup.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: This product is excellent because it helps the wood burn, beautifully.
customer_reviews.text: We had an issue with shipping and the seller went over and above so we got our Bonfire pit on time. We just love cooking dinner over it, then smores, then just watching it. It was designed to bring families together and it does!
customer_reviews.author: David T. Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Popularity spread like wildfire!
customer_reviews.text: Burns hot! We took this camping and used it instead of the fore pit. Roasted marshmallows really quickly! Outside does not stay shiny after use, which I don't have any problem with. We got this after a friend brought this to our house for a party. We got one, and 2 other sets of friends did too!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: it burns beautifully and gives a great flame
customer_reviews.text: Took this out camping last night, it burns beautifully and gives a great flame. Some smoke as you start the fire but once it gets going it rocks. Had the leave it in the rain overnight and woke up to a soggy mess but was able to clean it up and get it going again. It does discolor after first use. The fire ring on top turned a nice golden color, but this is to be expected with any metal fireplace. The outside still looks good stainless steel color. I also got the campfire version but didn’t get chance to use it.
customer_reviews.author: D.D

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: We love ours. Price was a bit steep but there’s no clean up & you can move it absolutely anywhere. The heat is awesome and we have bonfires with it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Magic

customer_reviews.title: this thing's great. When it first arrived it came without the ...
customer_reviews.text: Yeah, this thing's great. When it first arrived it came without the fire ring. A quick check with Customer Support and they sent if immediately. It's lightweight. Every fire burns hot and completely, so you're left with very little ash.
customer_reviews.author: forkmonkey

customer_reviews.title: It’s wonderful!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I can’t say that it’s 100% smokeless but the smoke is reduced by 80% or more. Wood burns much more efficient and lots of heat generated. I love to watch the super heated air come through the vents around the top. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: shucks98

customer_reviews.title: Hubby loves it
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this firepit. We are going to purchase 2 more for our sons for Christmas gifts. Waiting for price on Amazon to go back down. If not, you can purchase directly from Solo for a cheaper price with free shipping included.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie

customer_reviews.title: Instant bonfire out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend. Follow the instructions for smokeless bonfire. I just set this up for the first time tonight and I took a pic with my last wood piece which goes over the recommended use for smokeless bonfires. I am tempted to buy another as a gift. Sides do get really hot. Not sure I would place this directly on the grass without some type of shielding the ground. But overall this thing works awesome! Love the portability of this. Planning to move it to the driveway for Halloween.
customer_reviews.author: TFab

customer_reviews.title: This is the best fire pit!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We use this fire pit at our cabin. It does not disappoint!!! It is so easy to use. It is portable so we pack it up and put it away when we leave. The fire pit gives off great heat and the more it is "on", the more the heat spreads out. We did put a row of concrete blocks around it, for safety. (not too close to hamper the effectiveness of it). I have not one negative comment to make...we love it and highly recommend it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie D

customer_reviews.title: Best Smokeless Fire Pit.
customer_reviews.text: this works wonderful - always a problem when friends are over and everyone is moving around and bothered by the smoke. Does not happen any more.
customer_reviews.author: Bart

customer_reviews.title: would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight. Double-walled. Superior airflow. Holds standard sized pieces of firewood. All the things we were looking for. On top of that, the fire gets so hot that we really feel it even though the smoke is directed upward more than with a standard burn bowl. I would buy this again, but hopefully I won't have to.
customer_reviews.author: McJeeee

customer_reviews.title: Best $300 I ever spent!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, the best $300 I ever spent. I can't even believe how well this thing works. Everybody that camps with us is flat our amazed. If you've camped, you know how annoying trying to avoid the campfire smoke can be. Problem solved!
customer_reviews.author: Jack V.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product!!
customer_reviews.text: Saw the Solo Bonfire at a friend's house and I was so impressed, I ordered two of them (one for our vacation home and one for our main home). One was badly damaged in shipping and I had to return it, but I plan to reorder a second stove in the near future. The stove puts out an amazing amount of heat for the size of the unit, and as advertised, it produces very little smoke and ash. The secondary burning of gasses through the top vent holes adds a beautiful effect to the fire. I would like to see Solo build an even larger unit. I would be first in line to buy one!
customer_reviews.author: Jon N

customer_reviews.title: Wife was mad, not she loves it
customer_reviews.text: My wife was mad at the purchase, now we sit out back and enough the cool evening with this helping fend off the chill. Still a little pricey but getting our money out of it. Works a promised limited the smoke and in turn the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Best money I have spent on my patio!
customer_reviews.text: Absolute satisfaction with this product. I struggled for a bit to pull the trigger but well worth it. Great quality and produces an amazing fire. Only things I dont like 1) no lid. It comes with a cover but its more of a carry bag. I bought a 20” tile from Lowes. 2) it is super effective at burning wood...fast. So be prepared to use a little More than usual.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Gleim

customer_reviews.title: Worked well then it broke.
customer_reviews.text: It worked very well then the perforated bottom steel fell out. I was so sad, looks like the spot welds broke out of the inner bottom pan.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S Costa

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!! We LOVE it!
customer_reviews.text: We love how easy it starts, the dancing flames, it burns clean, it’s portable, a good size, and is well made. We bought one as a gift and then got one for ourselves.
customer_reviews.author: M. Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful design, works fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: Works beautifully, we enjoy it on our patio in every season. Great design and portability. Everybody asks why no smoke...great for patio party's and anyone very sensitive to smoke. Beautiful flame no smoke.
customer_reviews.author: home4mk

customer_reviews.title: I love it very much
customer_reviews.text: I love it very much . I bought it for two weeks also used it four times it was so perfect and safe, I would recommend you buy this stove it was very suitable for cold outdoor activities.Thank you solo stove bonfire!
customer_reviews.author: Rubing S.

customer_reviews.title: Quite possibly perfect.
customer_reviews.text: It's kind of hard to understand why I'm so happy with the Solo Stove Bonfire... but man I am. I really really love this thing. It's design makes starting a fire easy, even in the wind. It burns extremely efficiently, and has very little smoke. It makes my daughter happy every time we use it. Expensive, but wow it is really great.
customer_reviews.author: James McPherson

customer_reviews.title: ... the first time this weekend and it was very easy to light and burned really well
customer_reviews.text: We used our new Solo Stove for the first time this weekend and it was very easy to light and burned really well. At one point the fire was pretty much out and I realized I had another stick of word so I put it inside not expecting it to catch fire but it did within seconds and burned just as well as when it was full of firewood. You can really see the difference in how easy the wood burns due to the air flow. I think we will be using this bonfire way more than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Waters

customer_reviews.title: A true marriage of form and function!
customer_reviews.text: We have bought many firepits and this one is truly exceptional. Lightweight burns all wood thoroughly with only ash left, keep flames glowing and playing throughout, easy to clean, no smoke so everyone can sit close, puts out nice heat. Worth every penny because you will save money not having to replace the cheap ones every year that rust and fall apart and smoke and never seem to burn all the wood through to ash.
customer_reviews.author: SDG

customer_reviews.title: Great design and works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: These fire pits work as advertised. If you Keep the wood below the rim it doesn’t smoke. Be careful though because the sides get super hot. Double walled doesn’t mean cool to touch. They are portable too. Wood burns so cleanly that all you have left is ash.
customer_reviews.author: rebewhit

customer_reviews.title: Hot, clean, portable fire for camping.
customer_reviews.text: Most. Amazing. Firepit. Ever. Fantastic for RV Camping or even tailgating... burns hot and clean. We can use it under our awning when its raining and still be cozy, dry and warm! It does everything the maker says it does... and does it well!
customer_reviews.author: Sandman4IL

customer_reviews.title: This thing is bad ass
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing... what a great item. Fits in my travel trailer’s storage compartment. Nice heavy travel bag.
customer_reviews.author: Case

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely amazing fire pit. No smoke burns hot love it. We have 3
customer_reviews.author: Markj10821

customer_reviews.title: Believe the hype, this thing is amazing
customer_reviews.text: This thing is incredible! Once the fire is going it is virtually smokeless, you can hang around it all night without ever getting smoke in your face, and won’t smell like a campfire the next day. The way the flames reburns the smoke and gas make it look like a gas burner. Was instantly a talking piece at our establishment. They have perfected the fire pit.
customer_reviews.author: b2222

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: everything as described. very happy, nearly somkeless fires. I am worried its going to rust I put it back in my garage day after im done using it. If left outside I'm sure this thing would rust.
customer_reviews.author: Kilo

customer_reviews.title: Glad I tried this
customer_reviews.text: Love it, love it, love it! I use this on my wooden deck with no problem. The wood does burn fast, so have plenty on hand .
customer_reviews.author: Paul Houston

customer_reviews.title: Hot! Hot! Hot!
customer_reviews.text: Functions as described. Good price. Be nice if manufacturer offered a screen cover, rather than having to purchase an after market screen that is not a perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: dz0pzw

customer_reviews.title: We ordered one of these but decided to return it in exchange for the larger size.
customer_reviews.text: As we found with the larger size, the design allows cleaning only by turning upside down to empty the ash. Fire grate is not removable for thorough cleaning of ash.
customer_reviews.author: PitkinGirl

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: 100% as promised. Burns the wood completely, produces limited smoke, is very light and portable. My only nitpick is that the "fire ring" on top is a separate piece, that frequently gets knocked off center when trying to place a new log on the fire.
customer_reviews.author: BostonJack

customer_reviews.title: Burns clean, easy clean up.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this most of the summer, through the fall and now into winter and could not be happier with this product. Cleans up easy, burns VERY EFFICIENTLY with very little ash left.
customer_reviews.author: DickMcK

customer_reviews.title: Fire...
customer_reviews.text: I have a good time with this product. I have burned a lot of wood and enjoyed a few goods nights. The wind is the worst. That is with any fire. Love it so far...
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Cieplinski

customer_reviews.title: moving and loading
customer_reviews.text: Great product. More than I expected. The only problem I have is there are no handles or any way to move it or load it except to just grab underneath. Please add handles or lifting device.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan T.

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best purchases we have ever made. We bought this to replace a regular fire pit from Lowes. I simply love this! It doesn't smoke at all and the heat I can feel from 10 feet away! It's awesome. Very portable and will be coming camping with us! My hubs even cooks on it when he wants a quick sear on something! haha
customer_reviews.author: Jessi

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Too small. Have not used it yet Can I return it for somthing larger?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good sized fire pit.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how long this thing is going to last but it works pretty well so far. It throws a lot of heat around and it truly does reduce the smoke a bit, but not completely.
customer_reviews.author: Davey-Z

customer_reviews.title: Better than I could imagine!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing!!!!!! It looks small but I will tell you it is perfect! Tons of heat and burns down to VERY LITTLE ash. The double burn really works! You will not be disappointed!!!! The attached pic is what was left after using for four hours. Very little smoke. Friends all will want one!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We used it right out of the box and it's amazing! It throws off a lot of heat
customer_reviews.text: Wow! We used it right out of the box and it's amazing! It throws off a lot of heat, so this isn't the fire pit to let the little ones stand around roasting marshmallows, but for everything else -- you can't go wrong. Also, after burning a variety of comcustibles, we can report that there is almost no ash left to dispose of.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great stove
customer_reviews.text: This stove is awesome. Had it for a couple months now it’s not disappointed. Easy to clean if you do it the next morning and looks great. Great heat output. You need to have at least a couple logs otherwise it’s not burning hot enough.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Guarraci

customer_reviews.title: No smoke just like they say.
customer_reviews.text: Once lit, this is as they advertise, virtually smokeless. I used a few self lighting charcoal bricketts (4) to get things started and then it just works so well. No smoke after the updraft starts and that only takes a few minutes, then just a warm fire and no smoke.
customer_reviews.author: The Cralls

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Wish I bought this sooner. Worth every penny. Only advice is buy double the wood. It burns so hot and so efficient that you burn through wood rapidly.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: Stove works as advertised. It smokes quite a bit ...
customer_reviews.text: Stove works as advertised. It smokes quite a bit when you first start the fire, but it truly does become smokeless after a little while. So portable, we have used it at the beach & on camping trips. Others have been so impressed, they have purchsed their own! Definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: camille camacho

customer_reviews.title: Have had 6 fires and love it.
customer_reviews.text: Have had 6 fires and love it...works great..light and movable...cover it daily... Awaiting durability as I live on the Ocean north of Boston and the salt air kills everything... Harold B
customer_reviews.author: Harold Blank

customer_reviews.title: Burned aluminum cans with ease!
customer_reviews.text: I just got it today so I can't speak for longevity or durability. But I'm sure it's probe to corrosion if you don't take care of it. This is the only fire pit I've ever owned that will almost instantly melt aluminum cans by itself. Enough said
customer_reviews.author: brandon9689

customer_reviews.title: Less Smoke More Fire.
customer_reviews.text: Needed to burn a lot of branches and natural debris. Previous attempts made a bunch of smoke raid the neighbors. This helped keep smoke down and create a perfect fire pit for backyard Chilling.

product_meta.title: Solo Stove Bonfire Fire Pit - Large 19.5 Inch Stainless Steel Outdoor Smokeless Firepit | Portable Backyard Natural Wood Burning Firebowl | No Gas or Propane Required
feature_bullets: Solo Stove Bonfire, the world's most unique fire pit, pushes the limits of both combustion airflow efficiency and minimalist outdoor design with its all stainless steel construction. It was painstakingly engineered to provide a backyard fire experience that cannot be duplicated. Our patent pending design sold over $1.1M sold on Kickstarter.

SECONDARY COMBUSTION - Double wall design maximizes airflow and burning process. Bottom vent holes allow oxygen to the feed the fire from below while simultaneously channeling warm oxygen up between the walls of the stove and back into the fire.
EFFICIENT BURN/LOW SMOKE - A more complete burn means little to no smoke. It also means no more half burnt logs to deal with.
NO MORE DODGING SMOKE - Since Bonfire burns with almost no smoke, you'll spend less time dodging smoke and your clothes won't smell. You'll spend more time enjoying the fire!

EASY TO USE & PORTABLE - The Bonfire’s singular construction completely removes the need for parts and assembly. There is literally no setup. Heavy duty carry case included. Size: 14" tall, 19.5" diameter.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars719 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
